name: UnifiedAttribute
description: A unified attribute for the Level

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the button
default: 20.0

content.name: height
content.description:
the height of the button
default: 60.0

content.name: backing_colour
content.description:
the colour of the background
default: {r:0.04, g:0.04, b:0.04, a:1.0}

content.name: level_colours
content.description:
the colours of the level bars. The number of colours provided here will define the number of level bars present in the meter
default: [
     {r:0.98, g:0.98, b:0.98, a:1.0},
     {r:0.78, g:0.78, b:0.78, a:1.0},
 ]
